content: #20688 contains meta code about notations for truncated simplicial objects. It would be nice if some reviewer/maintainer with some meta experience could have a look at it.

I am hoping to recruit a metaprogramming expert to provide some feedback on #20688 and #20719, which together add some new notations and delaborators. I think most of the t-category-theory questions have been addressed, but of course feedback of any kind is appreciated.
A message was moved here from #PR reviews > #20668 truncated simplicial notations by Nick Ward.
